item.description:
Taste of Poland with the UNAGB
Thursday, June 13, 2013
7:00 - 9:00 p.m.

Do you enjoy cooking? Like to meet people? Then join HI-Boston and the UNAGB for a special Taste-Of event that will feature delicious Polish cooking. UNAGB's local Polish experts will teach you how to prepare and cook classic Polish perogies while you nibble on other Polish treats. In addition to food, there will be Polish trivia, games and opportunities to meet young professionals in Boston and hostel guests. Please be advised that this event has a $15 admission fee. To receive a special discount, please enter the promotional code "HIGuest" and receive a $5 discount off the $15 entrance fee! See you there!

Buy your ticket here: http://tasteofpoland.eventbrite.com/

group.name: Cultural Caf√© - Dine Out for a Cause

item.name: Taste of Poland
